generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <title>file</title>
</head>
<body>
  <form method="POST" action="http://localhost:7002/file/index">
    file: <input name="file" type="file" />
    <button type="submit">Upload</button>
  </form>
  <input type="file" name="file" id="file">

  <script>
    let fileNode = document.querySelector('#file')
    // Content-Type: multipart/form-data
    fileNode.addEventListener('change', () => {
      const file = fileNode.files[0]
      console.log(file)
      let formData = new FormData()
      formData.append('file', file)
      // fetch('http://localhost:7002/file/index', {
      //     method: 'POST',
      //     body: formData
      // })

      let xml = new XMLHttpRequest()
      xml.onreadystatechange = () => {
        if (xml.readyState === 4 && xml.status === 200) {
          console.log(xml.responseText)
        }
      }
      // xml.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'multipart/*')
      // xml.setRequestHeader('content-type', 'multipart/form-data')
      xml.open('POST', 'http://localhost:7002/file/index')
      xml.send(formData)
    })

  </script>
</body>
</html>
